Posts.Content: Hello, My wife is starting her first chemo this thursday for Breast cancer & secondary Liver/Bone cancer. A small family gathering has been organised tomorrow in her honour. Only snag is 1 of the children invited has a cold. We are taking our 2 year old twins. I realise this may be a stupid question but is there any danger of the chemo being delayed or made worse if my wife catches the cold. Any advice greatly appreciated. Paul.
Posts.Title: Cold vs 1st Chemo??

Posts.Content: Thank you, Good luck for Tuesday. Paul x
Posts.Title: Cold vs 1st Chemo??

Posts.Content: Thanks for that. We are going to go now. Good luck for tuesday. x
Posts.Title: Cold vs 1st Chemo??
